alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:51PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Thunderstorms And Heavy Rainfall Today and Tuesday Across The Eastern Interior... Strong scattered to numerous thunderstorms across the eastern Yukon Flats and Fortymile Country today will move southwest to the eastern Alaska Range. These thunderstorms will form in a very unstable environment and will then merge in clusters which may produce very locally heavy rainfall, with frequent lightning and small hail all possible. Outdoor recreators should be particularly aware, as frequent lightning and heavy rains will be of potential concern to those in the outdoors. Streams and creeks may also see significant rises in a short time period across the Fortymile Country and eastern Alaska Range. The time period of concern is today to Tuesday morning for the heaviest rains and potential stream/creek rises, especially those in Isabel Pass along the Richardson Highway.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands
